mapper.select: SELECT h.id, h.title, h.content, u.display_name AS createdByName, h.created_at AS createdAt, CASE WHEN r.read_at IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END AS readFlag, r.read_at AS readAt FROM handoffs h JOIN users u ON h.created_by = u.id LEFT JOIN handoff_reads r ON r.handoff_id = h.id AND r.user_id = #{loginUserId} ORDER BY h.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO handoffs (title, content, created_by) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{createdBy})
